title: League of Legends on a fairly old laptop?
body:
So I finally got a new power supply for this laptop. The laptop is fairly old and out-dated but I was wondering if I could play League on this laptop. I 
haven't installed League on this before but I have it installed on my other gaming set up. Can anyone also tell me how much fps i'd be getting off of this laptop if possible? Here are the System properties.
-Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 CPU
-M 370
- Installed memory (RAM) : 3.00 GB (2.87 GB usable)
-@2.40 GHz
-2.39 GHz
- 64 bit Operating system
- Windows edition : Windows 7 Home premium

replies.body:
I can't tell you what kinda FPS you'll see in-game (you'll have to test that :P) but your laptop definitely surpasses the [**minimum requirements**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/) to play League!

If you have any other questions, don't hesitate to ask! (o´ω`o)ﾉ
seems like not really playable, maybe >30 fps at fountain at lowest setting, but definitely unplayable fps in skirmishes
